Reviews.Title: “Nice and cosy hotel with responsible staff”
Reviews.Author: Ti_Cheng
Reviews.Content: hubby visited france christmas dec 2011 stayed 2 hotels trip glad seasons paris selected hotel former holiday inn hotel bit time day shower nice bed sleep welcoming feeling totally feel home night visit shower fantastic strong water pressure enjoyed wifi service provided tv channels french entertainment night online browse ipad wifi service definitely handy highlight 2 staffs lady named dana named vincent stay pleasent truly shown real service hotel provide remember day checked hubby planning disneyland paris advance booked tour bus previous hotel stayed dana nonetheless explained journey expect trip care customers told careful pickpockets whenever lot people watchful care vincent caring dana welcome smile courteous tired questions time explain directions seasons paris definitely cosy little hotel valued money ai chance visit paris thank

Reviews.Title: “Clean bedroom and decent breakfast but far away from the main touristy attractions”
Reviews.Author: Maritje
Reviews.Content: spend nights boyfriend ok staff friendly recommend lot time spend paris main attractions eiffel tower champselysées louvre etc close hotel subway found cons pros pros clean bedroom decent breakfast croissant bread apples apricots fresh orange juice jam nutella cereal eggs tea coffee close subway 2min walking amenities lux soap soap bars shampoo check noon cons expensive parking lot 18 euros day recepcionist check didnt speak french nor english fridge bottle cant fit main attractions sink bathroom clogged magazines available guests reception elle magazine 6 months ago free wifi didnt bedroom computer downstairs slow internet conection websites

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money, great place to stay for Paris visit”
Reviews.Author: Dutchman1955
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel little 100 meters métro line 14 station buy eur 10 minutes smack centre paris hotels staff friendly englishspeaking helpful booked single located 2nd floor street clean table chair liked curtains able totally darken night disadvantage streetnoise night free wifi lcdtv airconditioning bit pain bathroom taking shower meant bathroom flooded glass wall curtain knowing curtains difficult clean slightly larger glass wall appreciated positive aspects free breakfast menu croissants pain au chocolat baguette cheese meat fruit marmelade honey butter tea coffee milk own fresh orange juice free wifi price competitive makes hotel absolute stay visiting paris businesspleasure definitively stay visit

Reviews.Title: “basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: DAMA1974
Reviews.Content: stayed night paris hotel basic free breakfast croissants pain au chocolat free wifi positive tiny properly cleaned halfempty bottle water bedside table towels bathroom hairs bedsheets staff friendly particularly courteous ie food eat reception desk collect yourself ready recommend dont eat hotel except breakfast arrived late night hungry lasagne extremely disappointing microwave meal completely cold collected reception hotel fine arrived nighttime didnt feel particularly seeing daylight morning alright

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: x_emily_x_may_x
Reviews.Content: hotel hoped excellent location main attractions walkable distance dont fancy walking metro literally 2 minute walk hotel hotel set main road noisy didnt notice road traffic noise inside hotel safe walking home hotel late night shops patisseries restaurants road hotel hotel staff friendly couldnt helpful eat visit etc breakfast pleasant experience selection croissants fruit cereal bread decent cup tea extra benefit hotel underground car park meant safe car clean tidy bright nicely decorated definetly stay

Reviews.Title: “I would do it again.”
Reviews.Author: Philippa_Skoul
Reviews.Content: clean cozy luxurious satisfying price biggest closet unpack baggages space walk time breakfast poor day cold whats days wasnt breakfast free rare paris staff helpful free wifi running time location quiet metro station 2 min walking distance metro rer

Reviews.Title: “New name, still a nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: CJIMI
Reviews.Content: note name change hotel called seasons hotel accor hotel changing logo outside hotel stayed days august 2010 paid check credit card receipt read holiday inn stayed times past holiday inn liked quiet clean ac cable tv bbc cnn english speakers hotel offers complementary newspapers herald tribune english le french change breakfast buffet costs 6 euros person instead 13 downside offer bacon eggs potatoes buffet table machine makes fresh squeezed orange juce treat airport train st michel station transfer rer line francois stop follow signs rue du exit hotel center paris adjacent rer andor speed metro line 14 sights 1015 minutes enjoy paris

Reviews.Title: “Okay hotel in nice area”
Reviews.Author: JuliaV_9
Reviews.Content: average hotel nice lots shops restaurants metro stops seine river banks 10 mins walk average breakfast lobby nice cheaper breakfast walked past month june 2010 staying hotel looks renovating closed guests mind booking

Reviews.Title: “Good value, friendly, not great location but convenient for line 14”
Reviews.Author: Zavya
Reviews.Content: stay lot business paris links via line 14 prone strike action key city staff friendly obliging clean comfortable functional fine day overlooking rue quiet windows closed typical buffet breakfast evening food served restaurant value money
